thread.section_title: Left Bank Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: WOW!
thread.title_full: WOW! - Review of Left Bank Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Katie C
title: WOW!
text:
We recently spent 2 nights here.
The staff were welcoming and helpful and there are a variety of services available from reception (tours, free newspapers, umbrellas for the rain)
We had a gorgeous room with beautiful Parisian feature - very large in size with beautiful shutter style windows.
The metro station Odeon is literally opposite and you can reach Notre Dame and the Lourve in about 10/15 minutes walking.
I can not recommend this hotel enough - the only shame was we couldn't stay longer!
